chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Calvin W Farley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Calvin W Farley is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Calvin W Farley was found guilty of Resisting/Failing to Stop/Fleeing, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(2t).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

Court grants Huber and good time.
Must report by 3:00 PM on Wednesday, April 15, 2015.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
COVERS 14CF273, 14CF205, 14TR1293.
State moves to amend 14CF205 Count 1 to 346.04(2t).  Court grants motion and amends Count 1 to 346.04(2t) Misdemeanor Fleeing. 
Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented.  Court questions defendant. 
14CF205: Defendant pleads Guilty to Count 1 as Amended. Court accepts and finds Guilty to Count 1 as amended.  
Court orders remaining Counts in 14CF205, 14CF273 and 14TR1293 dismissed.   
State recommends joint agreement.
Attorney O'Hara recommends joint agreement.
Defendant addresses Court.

Court relates and orders:
Jail: 45 days with huber and good time. 4 days credit for time served. 
Must report by 3:00 p.m. Wednesday, April 15, 2015.
Court costs.

Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 14CF205, 14CF273 AND 14TR1293

No agreement yet.
All above reset to 4/08/15 at 2:00 PM
Bond(s) to continue.

  Plea hearing scheduled for April 8, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 14CF205, 14CF273 AND 14TR1293

No agreement yet.
Reset to 2/23/15 at 2:00 PM.
Bond(s) to continue.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 23, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CF205 and 14CF273 called.  Reset - Bond continued.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 12, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Russell E. Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
COVERS 14CF205 AND 14CF273.
Reset.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 10, 2014 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Calvin W Farley in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Russell E. Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives formal reading and pleads NG to both counts. This case and 14CF273 will be set for plea 10/27/14 at 2:00 p.m.  Plea hearing scheduled for October 27, 2014 at 02:00 pm.

Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
